EmailTemplate.name: BSP Consultation Reschedule via Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Enter Subject
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for reaching out to me; I can definitely reschedule your attorney consultation. The attorney has the following times available:
DATE-TIME
DATE-TIME
DATE-TIME
Please let me know if any of these times will work for you. Time slots fill-up quickly, so please reply as soon as possible to ensure your desired consultation time is secured. If you prefer, you may also reschedule by calling me directly at (855) 787-1951 x{!User.Extension}, Monday–Friday from 6 am – 6pm PT. If I’m unavailable, you can also email bizhelp@legalzoom.com to reach the next available member of my team.
{!User.FirstName} Business Account Manager (855) 787-1951 x{!User.Extension} BizHelp@legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
